name: places/ChIJj8l6NK5YwokRAvkMg7-AOLM
formattedAddress: 1775 York Ave, New York, NY 10128, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1775 York Ave, New York, NY 10128-6900, USA

originalText.text: Bentley is an amazing photographer. We really loved working with her and recommend her highly. She was able to put all three of my girls completely at ease, almost immediately. She managed to get them to laugh and play freely while she photographed. She then captured some great moments that we will now have preserved for a lifetime. It's obvious that she has years of experience. She also uses only natural lighting which improves the quality of the photos. Instead of posed shots with a flash you get beautifully lit candid moments. We will most definitely be using her again and again.

originalText.text: I have done two shoots with Bentley Waters Photography and am thrilled with my pictures. During both shoots Bentley very naturally and organically snapped away as my daughter and I enjoyed some time in the beautiful outdoors. Bentley was great with my daughter and even gave me advice about which outfits to put her in at different points during the shoot. She has a great eye for sure. When I received my proofs after both shoots....wow! The way Bentley captured my daughter's expressions is awesome, the pictures of her are truly so "her." Also, we now have many great mother - daughter moments captured in pictures that will be forever cherished by the two of us and all of our family. I'd also like to add that he way nature is shown in both sets of my pictures is fantastic. I'm a big nature person and I feel like Bentley was able to get these shots that draw you right into the greenery, light, beauty and feeling of summertime outdoors. I can't wait to book my next shoot!

originalText.text: Bentley is a wonderfully talented photographer.  She has taken photos of our family at least three times and we keep going back for more.  Our stairwell wall is covered in photos all taken by Bentley.  She has an amazing eye for capturing the moment--especially with children.  Bentley puts our children (and us!) at ease right away and we all loving spending the time with her when she is taking our photos--she is super easy to be around.  Bentley is a true talent and her work is full of love.  Also, Bentley is very professional--on time and responsive to all emails/phone calls.  I highly recommend Bentley.

text.text: Bentley is a wonderfully talented photographer.  She has taken photos of our family at least three times and we keep going back for more.  Our stairwell wall is covered in photos all taken by Bentley.  She has an amazing eye for capturing the moment--especially with children.  Bentley puts our children (and us!) at ease right away and we all loving spending the time with her when she is taking our photos--she is super easy to be around.  Bentley is a true talent and her work is full of love.  Also, Bentley is very professional--on time and responsive to all emails/phone calls.  I highly recommend Bentley.

originalText.text:
Bentley has been the "recorder" of life for my family for many years now. She has captured some of the most important moments in my life - bridal shower, wedding shower, and now the lives of my kids - from their first months of life to their baptisms to portraits of them as they grow and change. I feel so lucky to have had her capture these incredible milestones.

Bentley has a light, elegant touch that brings out a magical quality in children and allows them to come alive on film. She is gentle and approachable with children and makes them feel comfortable being themselves in front of the camera. This, of course, leads to photos that feel natural and genuine. The photos she has taken of my children are truly some of my most prized possessions.

Bentley is a pleasure to work with, is very responsive over email or by phone and is flexible in working with the busy schedules of most families. She is also very helpful in advising what to do with her photos after the shoot - whether it's creating a photo wall at home or a beautiful album. I can't recommend Bentley enough.

originalText.text: Bentley is an absolute artist in her approach to family photos and she has the gift of seeing things about our family that she is then able to perfectly capture in her photos. I always feel as if my family is in the middle of a beautiful editorial spread when I look at our photo gallery from Bentley each year. I can't imagine ever having anyone else photograph us! She is also incredible with all different personalities and children and brings an instant lightness to the process. You will have a great time while she captures your memories...
